title: How to Set Up Email Account on an Android Device

steps.title: Open the Email app.
steps.content: Open the Email app. Open the launcher and click the icon in the menu that says "Email." This will be factory-installed on your Android mobile.

steps.title: Select your email provider (e.
steps.content: Select your email provider (e. g. Hotmail, Gmail, etc.).

steps.title: Enter the required details.
steps.content: Enter the required details. When you have chosen your email provider, you will be prompted to enter your email address and your account details.

steps.title: Assign a name for your account.
steps.content: Assign a name for your account. After this, you need to get your email account assigned to a name. More than one email accounts can be set up in Android Email; therefore, you can assign any name to your account for your own convenience.

steps.title: Use your email.
steps.content: Use your email. It's done! You can now send and get messages from your Android mobile phone.
